channel.title: Some Delta Questions And Client Questions I Need Them Alot.GOOD PAY!
channel.description:
Some Delta Questions And Client Questions I Need Them Alot. Please Help ME Answer The 1's u know
1-when im pking in mage bank i hit (0) and the other player's hp goes down and i get exp too why?????? Most Important:
2-How To Stop Music Loop In Client:
3-How To Know My Coordinates Of My Clue Scroll?
[b]4-How To Make Pk Point Shop??? Like D Claws For 500 Pk Points![/b]
5-HOW TO MAKE THE ITEM ONLY CAN BE WEARED BY DONATER?????
6-How TO MAKE DONATERS AREA????
7-How To Stop Syi's,Nulls I Cannot fix client per thread
8-How To Add ::Alert Like ALERT: ALL GO TO HOME THERE IS A DROP PARTY!
9-How To Make When U Click On Portal It Shows Like Home Donaters Area Mods Area--Need Player Rights ITS EASY PLEASE I NEED IT ALOT!
[b]10-HOW TO FIX DUPING ON DELTA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ILL PAY 10$ Like First Trade window accept then accept decline 11-How To Make The New King Black Dragon When He Die He Dont Get Miserable Like New GFX WHEN HE DIE OR SOMETHING??? and trade other player 3 times and both logout OR JUST GIVE ME THE CODE U CANNOT LOGOUT AFTER TRADE IN 20 SECONDS![/b]

item.title: Some Delta Questions And Client Questions I Need Them Alot.GOOD PAY!
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

Answer by 8:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“alert”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
try {

		String announcement = command.substring(8);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="[~!ALERT!~]: "+command.substring(8);
		sM("You have successfully sent an announcement.");

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("Wrong syntax! Use ::announce [ANNOUNCEMENT].");
		}

}[/code]
Thats quick out my head. If there are errors, say it.

Read full topic
